name: Rebirth of Chaos: Eternal Saga
description:
【Features】
◆Challenge Boss to gain epic gear
Team up to kill rare demon Boss. Enter dungeons to fight over epic gear with hundreds of players.
Through random drops, you can get epic gear by killing even mobs! AFK at work and collect epic gear after work.

◆Free trade on gear of value
Any price is possible at Auction House. Cheap epic gear for sale.
Big money can be made by selling second-hand gear.

◆Gorgeous skins and diverse costume
Over a hundred sets of costume for you to build your own style, and can be claimed by unlocking achievement.
Dozens of mythical beast mounts, such as Frost Wyrm, Gilded Dragon, for you to choose to travel around the Land of Chaos.

◆Meet soul mates and battle companions
Follow your heart to find your soul mate in the Land of Chaos.
Work together with your buddies to cultivate virgin land, explore mysterious sea areas, and hunt for lost treasures.

◆Impressive gameplay and varied styles
Purgatory Boss, Arena, Ladder PVP, Empire Team Battle. You can break through limit to become the best of the best.
6 occupations for you to enjoy 6 different kinds of experience. Unlock talents to build your own battle style!
